message.body: Oh my god. I just called and left a message. I hate it! I'm literally shaky! Ugh. I told her to give me a call back today.
Okay. Hopefully she returns it. I feel like they miss it on purpose to see what you have to say. Like when I called Steph to let her know about my offer from Gap.
Ah. I'm going to be looking at my phone all day.

Phew. She got back to me. She was on vacation last week too that's why she didn't call. But she said within the next two weeks they'll have a decision. They have at least one other interview coming up. I think there was one before me too. She said she's still interested and that I'm not out of the running.
I told her I would accept hands down again.
Two weeks is a long time! But at least I know. And there is no start date yet.
Two weeks will go by in no time
